qMeasure.qDef:
SUM(
	$(=
    	 IF(GetSelectedCount(Linea)>0 AND GetSelectedCount(Fecha)=0 AND GetSelectedCount(Fecha_Hora)=0 AND GetSelectedCount(Mes)=0 AND GetSelectedCount(Año)=0,
        	vFiltrosPMPSinLinea,
    		IF(GetSelectedCount(Fecha)=0 AND GetSelectedCount(Linea)=0 AND GetSelectedCount(Mes)=0 AND GetSelectedCount(Año)=0,
                vFiltrosPMP,
				IF(GetSelectedCount(fecha_version)>0 AND GetSelectedCount(Linea)=0,
                vSinFiltrosPMPLineasPredef,
                vSinFiltrosPMP
                )
                
    		)
         )
         
    )
flujo_pot)
